wwutil.sys
Class FnUtil

java.lang.Object
  wwutil.sys.FnUtil

public class FnUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A simple class to add functional operations to make iteration easier. Import the interfaces and methods by: import wwutil.sys.FnUtil.*;

Nested Class Summary
static interface FnUtil.ApplyFn<V>
          Callback function to work on a value and return a value of same type
static interface FnUtil.ApplyFn2<V1,V2>
          Callback function to work on two parameters
static interface FnUtil.FoldFn<R,I>
          Callback function to work on a value of type I and an accumulator of type R and return a value of type R
static interface FnUtil.FoldMapFn<R,K,V>
           
static interface FnUtil.PredicateFn<V>
          Callback function to check a value satisfying the predicate
static interface FnUtil.TransformFn<R,I>
          Callback function to work on a value of type I and return a value of type R
